original_text: But thou shalt open thine hand wide unto him, and shalt surely lend him sufficient for his need, in that which he wanteth.
korean_text: 반드시 네 손을 그에게 펴서 그에게 필요한 대로 쓸 것을 넉넉히 꾸어주라

sentences.original_text: But thou shalt open thine hand wide unto him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 네 손을 그에게 넓게 열고,

sentences.original_text: and shalt surely lend him sufficient for his need,
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 필요한 만큼 꼭 빌려주어야 하며,
